windows.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; cmake ..; cmake --build .; cd src; cp Debug/pngEditor.exe ../../output; cd ../../.vscode; cp launchWin.json launch.json; popd

linux.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; cmake ..; cmake --build .; cd src; cp pngEditor ../../output;  cd ../../.vscode; ln -sf ./launchLin.json launch.json; popd

windows.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; cmake ..; cmake --build . --config Release; cd src; cp Release/pngEditor.exe ../../output; cd ../../.vscode; cp launchWin.json launch.json; popd

linux.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; cmake ..; cmake --build . --config Release; cd src; cp pngEditor ../../output;  cd ../../.vscode; ln -sf ./launchLin.json launch.json; popd

windows.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; rm -r *; git restore ./.gitignore; git restore ./logs; rm ../output/pngEditor.exe; popd

linux.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; rm -r *; rm -r .*; git restore ./.gitignore; git restore ./logs; rm ../output/pngEditor; popd

pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build/logs; valgrind -s --leak-check=full --show-leak-kinds=all --log-file=./valgrind_PID%p.log --suppressions=./leaks_maskLin.txt ${workspaceFolder}/output/pngEditor; echo Check valgrind logfile at $PWD; popd

windows.command: pushd ${workspaceFolder}/build; mkdir logs; cd logs; drmemory -logdir . -ignore_kernel -- ${workspaceFolder}/output/pngEditor; echo Check drmemory logfile at ${workspaceFolder}/build/logs; popd
